questions.question: その話は信憑性に（  ）ところがある。
questions.hint:
信憑性（しんぴょうせい, shinpyousei）- credibility
欠ける（かける, kakeru）- to lack

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 欠ける（かける, kakeru）- to lack

  • 浮かれる（うかれる, ukareru）- to be festive; to be carried away
  • 逃れる（のがれる, nogareru）- to escape
  • なびく（なびく, nabiku）- to flutter; to be swayed

English Translation: That story has questionable credibility.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 欠ける（かける, kakeru）- to lack

  • 浮かれる（うかれる, ukareru）- to be festive; to be carried away
  • 逃れる（のがれる, nogareru）- to escape
  • なびく（なびく, nabiku）- to flutter; to be swayed

English Translation: That story has questionable credibility.

questions.question: 彼女は努力の（  ）夢を叶えた。
questions.hint:
努力（どりょく, doryoku）- effort
夢（ゆめ, yume）- dream
叶える（かなえる, kanaeru）- to fulfill

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 末に（すえに, sue ni）- after much (effort); finally

  • かたわら（かたわら, katawara）- beside; while
  • わきで（わきで, wakide）- on the sidelines
  • ながらに（ながらに, nagara ni）- while (doing something)

English Translation: She finally fulfilled her dream after much effort.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 末に（すえに, sue ni）- after much (effort); finally

  • かたわら（かたわら, katawara）- beside; while
  • わきで（わきで, wakide）- on the sidelines
  • ながらに（ながらに, nagara ni）- while (doing something)

English Translation: She finally fulfilled her dream after much effort.

questions.question: この件に関しては、上司の許可を（  ）進めてください。
questions.hint:
件（けん, ken）- matter
許可（きょか, kyoka）- permission
進める（すすめる, susumeru）- to proceed

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 得てから（えてから, ete kara）- after obtaining

  • 備えてから（そなえてから, sonaete kara）- after preparing
  • 引きずってから（ひきずってから, hikizutte kara）- after dragging along
  • 張り切ってから（はりきってから, harikitte kara）- after being highly motivated

English Translation: Please proceed after obtaining your supervisor’s permission.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 得てから（えてから, ete kara）- after obtaining

  • 備えてから（そなえてから, sonaete kara）- after preparing
  • 引きずってから（ひきずってから, hikizutte kara）- after dragging along
  • 張り切ってから（はりきってから, harikitte kara）- after being highly motivated

English Translation: Please proceed after obtaining your supervisor’s permission.

questions.question: ご注文の商品は（  ）、こちらでお待ちください。
questions.hint:
注文（ちゅうもん, chuumon）- order
準備（じゅんび, junbi）- preparation

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 準備が整い次第（じゅんびがととのいしだい, junbi ga totonoi shidai）- as soon as preparation is complete

  • 気が済み次第（きがすみしだい, ki ga sumi shidai）- as soon as one feels satisfied
  • 根回し次第（ねまわししだい, nemawashi shidai）- depending on prior arrangements
  • すり替え次第（すりかえしだい, surikae shidai）- depending on replacement

English Translation: As soon as your order is ready, please wait here.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 準備が整い次第（じゅんびがととのいしだい, junbi ga totonoi shidai）- as soon as preparation is complete

  • 気が済み次第（きがすみしだい, ki ga sumi shidai）- as soon as one feels satisfied
  • 根回し次第（ねまわししだい, nemawashi shidai）- depending on prior arrangements
  • すり替え次第（すりかえしだい, surikae shidai）- depending on replacement

English Translation: As soon as your order is ready, please wait here.

questions.question: 会議の議事録は、（  ）提出してください。
questions.hint:
会議（かいぎ, kaigi）- meeting
議事録（ぎじろく, gijiroku）- minutes (of a meeting)
提出（ていしゅつ, teishutsu）- submission

explanation.correct:
Correct! : 至急（しきゅう, shikyuu）- immediately; urgently

  • 粗末（そまつ, somatsu）- crude; shabby
  • 過敏（かびん, kabin）- oversensitive
  • 密接（みっせつ, missetsu）- close (relationship)

English Translation: Please submit the minutes urgently.
explanation.incorrect:
Answer: 至急（しきゅう, shikyuu）- immediately; urgently

  • 粗末（そまつ, somatsu）- crude; shabby
  • 過敏（かびん, kabin）- oversensitive
  • 密接（みっせつ, missetsu）- close (relationship)

English Translation: Please submit the minutes urgently.
